name: gpt4o-detector-extension
description: Chrome extension for detecting GPT-4o generated text on X/Twitter

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run minify
scripts.copy: npm run copy:manifest && npm run copy:html && npm run copy:assets
scripts.minify: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css
scripts.minify:css: cleancss -o dist/popup/popup.css src/popup/popup.css && cleancss -o dist/content/styles.css src/content/styles.css
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch src --ext js,css,html,json --exec npm run build
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && bestzip ../releases/extension-v$npm_package_version.zip *

author: AI Detector Team
